title: Openness
description: We are always ready for organizational development, new ideas and partnerships. We are also transparent and accountable to the beneficiaries, the local community, local authorities, partners, and donors.

title: Honesty
description: In our actions, we profess truthfulness, principledness and loyalty to our commitments - to help people in need.

title: Empathy
description: We always listen carefully, try to understand what our partner or beneficiary thinks and feels.

title: Independence
description: We act solely in the interests of people who need help and are not dependent on anyone's political, economic, military or other goals.
